content: fancy cozy colourful begin at the heel and quickly work your way up the leg and down to your toes fun to make even more fun to wear this spiral sock is worked with two colours from the middle of the heel in an increasing spiral after that we work the leg and the foot most of the sock is worked in double_crochet double_crochet or linked double_crochet ldc it is best to get familiar with those stitches before trying them on this sock you can use any yarn you want i recommend light worsted yarn you will need two skeins in matching colours english is not my first language and this is my first written down pattern ever so please be gentle
